website_summaries.verdict: A basic yet modern opener that offers quick and clean cork removal.
pros: Thoughtful packaging and overall presentation make this an ideal gift set
cons: Non rechargeable batteries need to be replaced, incurring additional cost

customer_reviews.title: No Whining Here
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and giftable. Have had similar wine openers but this is the first that stops when cork is removed, a nice feature really. Picked up at a flash sale price so even better. Previous opener of this type was Wolfgang Puck Item and worked well for a little over a year before calling it quits.Battery replacement did not work after awhile. This is sleek and sits well in foil cutter holder on counter and has small footprint so not hogging space. Appears nicely made and if serviceable for at least a year is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Worked so far!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well so far! I had it for almost a year now! Make sure to position it in the middle of the bottle /cork and hold on tight for it to be effective at alll times! I had some issues about it sliding on one side/ cracking the cork at a wrong angle and then I have to resort to the traditional corkscrew to get the broken cork out of the bottle...so just watch out...
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work and was given as a Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I have never had a problem with anything from Amazon before but this didn’t work! I bought it as a Birthday gift and gave it way after the refund time frame so had no clue it didn’t work. It only went in reverse...several people several attempts to get it to work and nada! So embarrassing that I gifted this I will not buy anything for a gift like this from Amazon again .... very sad 😰
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and is way less effort than a conventional bottle opener. It also would make a great gift. The base doubles as a foil cutter, and it includes the batteries which are both a nice touch. You can see in my video how quick it is (although it would be easier with two hands but I assume you are not typically holding a camera while opening wine...)
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Functional, great for parties or office space
customer_reviews.text: Wine bottle opener works well! Easy to use, single button that’s user friendly. It pulls the cork out and also goes the other way to remove from the opener. Great for my office space where we have happy hour. The cork doesn’t get stuck and comes out clean. Really appreciate the addition of batteries so I don’t have to search for some.
customer_reviews.author: Leesha Dialani

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Bought this one rather than sbrechsrgeabke since just about all of the rechargeables had reviews that the chargeable battery stopped holding a charge after a while. We'll never have that problem with this and it's no more inconvenient to replace the batteries than it is to remember to keep one charged.
customer_reviews.author: WiseSnapple

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Look and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with batteries so it's ready to use asap! great to be given as a gift too. Get the "white color" because it comes out silver and it's a beautiful finish. Black didn't go well with my decor but this chrome one I can add to my bar with all my wine bottles! Can't wait to pop open a bottle of wine!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Puscas

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift! It comes with a beautiful box! And the opener itself is great. It’s so easy to operate. I love that they included the batteries too. No need to search around for batteries. The day I got it delivered is the day I could start using it. Within 3 seconds my bottle of wine was open and ready to drink. I’ve tried it on both the fake wax corks and the real wood ones and it works great on both. I don’t know why I didn’t buy this sooner and struggled with the hand held opener. The foil cutter is great added touch too!
customer_reviews.author: Aneta L

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This wine opener is awesome! I bought two for Christmas, one for me and one for my son-in-law. We both think it works flawlessly and it does everything they claim it does. I would buy more as gifts for my wine drinking family and friends. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Mickie Mey

customer_reviews.title: Opens wine bottles with no effort
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second auto wine opener I have purchased. Bought the first time for my dad as a gift (he has arthritis). His is rechargeable. This one uses batteries which makes it easier for traveling so you don’t have to take a charger with you!
customer_reviews.author: T Rakis

customer_reviews.title: Guest shocker :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my automatic wine opener! It’s so cool to use it in front of my guests :) Everyone loves it! It comes in a box which is so cool! Plus, I’m happy to get it with batteries! That was an extra point for me to order it. You just open the box and install the battery! Here you go, you have coolest wine opener ever! :) Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on your wrists
customer_reviews.text: This is my first automatic wine bottle opener. I love it. I thought it would be a frivolous purchase because it seems lazy but it’s a really great accessory to have around. I have psoriatic arthritis and my wrists ache often. May as well get the help while I can!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Open with ease
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant purchasing this item but after watching my mother in law open her wine without assistance I’m so glad I did. Her hands are weakening and was struggling with a typical wine bottle opener. Bonus was it came with batteries which I always forget to purchase when at a store.
customer_reviews.author: patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, fast shipping, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product! I plan on gifting it to my mother in law who is a huge wine fan! Excited to share this product with family. Easy to use, great value for the price, and looks great! Fast shipping, great presentation, and came with batteries. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It is working!
customer_reviews.text: I have rather expansive wine bottle opener because of osteoarthritis that particular opener is hard on my fingers. This one is working so far even on corks that are not made 100% of cork. Sadly more and more companies are using those. my logic is: it's doing it's job without emptying your pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Miskewitch

customer_reviews.title: Really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I have had other cordless wine openers. Once they die, you have to replace them. This one, has replaceable batteries. When it dies, you just replace the batteries! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Grace S

customer_reviews.title: Best gift, super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Never having to use the corkscrew again! Leaves the corks in perfect condition if you want to use them for crafts later. Best purchase I've ever had on Amazon yet. I've had it for over 6 months and the battery is just now wearing off. I've used it almost 2 times a week
customer_reviews.author: TexasSmile

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It was broken. Couldn't even try it. Not from shipping either.
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine opener.very easy to ues.great quality and convenient stand.
customer_reviews.author: shiyanchen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a wine bottle opener before so this was my first one. The opener is the easiest thing to use. All you have to do is put the batteries in and the item is ready to use. I loved the fancy look and how nice it looks on my bar stand. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Yaime

customer_reviews.title: Makes Opening a Bottle of Wine a Cinch
customer_reviews.text: I've had other electric corkscrews before, but this one is particularly nice because it runs on batteries and doesn't require a charging base. So far I've had no problems opening any bottles with this. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: exquisite.  easy to use. worth
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite appearance, stainless steel is simple yet without losing the atmosphere! It only takes five seconds to open the bottle, and it is also easy to use. The cork does not leave any debris. It doesn't worry about the taste of the wine. It is worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: YasinZhou

customer_reviews.title: Fancy good wine opener.
customer_reviews.text: The package look so fancy. My first electric wine opener. Tried it yesterday and I can see it working through that little transparent window. From now on no more broken cork in my wine. It came with batteries too.

customer_reviews.title: best wine opener
customer_reviews.text: This wine opener is really amazing! I don't have to make any effort to open wine, the shape is elegant, the packaging is very sophisticated, my friends are in love with how chic and fast! The seller is very attentive, and sent my order very fast! I recommend!

This wine opener automatically opens the bottle of wine in seconds with the push of a single button. It’s super easy to use and I love it!! This would also make a great gift as well!

customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest wine opener we have ever owned. Love it! Just push the down button to lower into the cork. When it is all the way down push the up ...

This one has more power than either of those and I can just replace that batteries! Love it! And the foil cutter is the best I have EVER used.

I ordered two to replace more expensive wine openers that had failed in two different locations. I will be ordering more for gifts. It works as described - simple, efficient, and a good value. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Do not Waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This wine bottle opener is a big piece of junk. As soon as I took it out of the box the black ring at the bottom came off. I used it today for the first time and the entire thing came apart. I had to put it back together but it will come apart each time I use it. This item is made very cheaply and is just not worth the money. Not recommended. I gave it one star because I can’t leave no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Loved by previous wine opener I'd had for some 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: The product performs just as expected and promised. Loved by previous wine opener I'd had for some 12 years, but love this one even more.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to open 1.5 bottles of wine before the batteries ran out. I would return it, but it is too late.

customer_reviews.title: it work well and easy to handle it
customer_reviews.text: First time using a electric wine opener, it work well and easy to handle it. very helpful . It is also a good choice for gift. The package is fancy
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to one important detail
customer_reviews.text: This will be our third cordless wine bottle opener. While there are many models to choose from there is one very important detail to consider. The Qco, Qce opener utilizes batteries you can easily replace. Many other brands have built-in rechargeable batteries and a charger. Don’t be persuaded. Here’s the issue; once the recharge batteries can’t be recharged, you may as well throw the entire opener away because there is no practical way to replace the rechargeable batteries even though the rest of the opener is functional.
customer_reviews.author: Bern H

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I’ve used. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a couple of electric corkscrews but find this one to be superior. I’ve been using this one for several months now and am very happy. It’s well made, fast and super easy to master. It helps to put your wine bottle on a kitchen towel to help keep it from rotating. Grab the bottle,with one hand, place the corkscrew over the top and press the lower part of the power button. The corkscrew drives fully into the cork with surprisingly little effort then continues rotating and completely removes it. Then press the top half of the power button and it reverses to eject the cork. How simple is that?
customer_reviews.author: cwd777

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Top of the line for less!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the rechargeable ones in the past but this AA battery operated one outperforms them 10 to 1 for the following reasons: It pops the cork on 40 bottles of wine per set of batteries, which outperforms rechargeable batteries by a large margin. It is always ready for service provided you replace the batteries before it slows down. No tether so store it anywhere with or without the base. In fact the base, which doubles as a seal clipper, can be stored separately. The design is simple and elegant, and it works very well provided the wine bottle cork is whole and undamaged. I do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh man

customer_reviews.title: Works just as easily
customer_reviews.text: Opening the bottle with the opener has made life so much easier. The wine opener is fast, easy and effective in opening a bottle of wine; because it is electric there is no awkward fumbling or endless turning. Automatically pulls the cork right out without breaking any pieces off. Then with another simple push of a button, it releases the cork right into your hand. All I Han e to say is that I love this wine opener. But I don't like one thing it uses the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Hermanuella. R. Hyppolite

customer_reviews.title: Works Like Magic
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! Not only is it easy to use, it's hilarious to watch. Four stars because the foil cutter broke soon after receiving this, but frankly, the cork remover goes right through the foil. If you want to be cool, remove the foil from the cork before your guests arrive, then let them work the magic machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So simple
customer_reviews.text: This wine opener was easy to understand and use the very first time. The looks are sleek and stylish, and would make a perfect gift, if you are willing to give it away. I love that the bottom comes off to cut the foil off the bottle as well. I really am amazed at how easy and convenient it is to use! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use

customer_reviews.text: This changes the game ! It makes opening wine bottles so simple. You put the opener and hold down the button and keep holding it down eventually the cork comes out! Super easy and super nice.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful upgrade from a manual opener

The foil cutter effortlessly removes the pesky foil from the top to get you started. The clear plastic guide not only protects you, but it also helps you drill down straight (not sure if anyone else struggles with that too.) Overall very happy.

I still had bit of trouble holding bottle still while using this but I managed. Anyone with difficulty with manual corkscrews will be very happy with this great gadget but be prepared to install new batteries because the batteries that come with do not last long.

product_meta.title: QcoQce Cordless Automatic Wine Opener - Electric Wireless Bottle Opener - Battery-Operated Corkscrew - With Foil Cutter / Stand and Batteries Included
product_meta.description:
Makes Fun and Easy to use. 
Struggling to open a bottle of wine can put a damper on any party. In order to avoid broken corks floating in your wine bottle. this wine opener automatically opens any bottle of wine in seconds with the push of a single button, Enjoy yourself on the party. 

Open Your Wine With One Hand. 
Wine lovers with injured or weak hands will appreciate how simple it is to uncork any bottle of wine with this beautiful wireless corkscrew. It makes a fun conversation starter - everyone will want to open a bottle for themselves. 

Celebrate With Wine At Any Occasion. 
Opening a bottle of wine doesn’t have to be saved for a special occasion. With this handy wine opener, you'll be able to enjoy trying a new bottle whenever the mood strikes. The foil cutter doubles as an elegant stand so the two are never far apart. 

Opens More than 40 Bottles. 
Our products are able to open between 40 to 60 bottles before having to change the 4 AA batteries. We include one set of 4 batteries with your purchase. 
Replace them with four new Alkaline batteries for an even more economical option. 
Order Your New Cordless Automatic Wine Opener Today and Dazzle Everyone At Your Next Dinner Party.
feature_bullets: ●REMOVES ANY CORK IN SECONDS: Wine-lovers will appreciate the simple push-button operation of this clever gadget. Destined to become your favorite wine accessory. Get back to your dinner guests and enjoy the wine.

●EASY-TO-OPERATE: This is the one corkscrew all your friends and family can handle. The clear window ensures effortless bottle opening without any guesswork. One button activates the corkscrew’s up/down operation.

●OPENS 40+ BOTTLES: Four AA batteries are all you need to open more than 40 bottles of your favorite wine. Your first set of batteries is included with your purchase. Makes the best housewarming, birthday or Christmas gift.

●FOIL CUTTER DOUBLES AS A STAND: Easily cuts through foil to remove any seal so the wine opener can do its job. When the electronic corkscrew isn’t in use, simply rest it on top of the foil cutter for a convenient stand.

●AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS - SILVER AND BLACK: Choose from classic black or elegant silver. Both are ideal for entertaining and durable enough for everyday use. Enjoy the convenience and flexibility - travels to parties with you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars214 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
